column2: The DMV scene with the sloths is one of the funniest scenes in any animated movie. I was crying laughing.
The twist that Assistant Mayor Bellwether was the villain all along, using the Night howlers to turn predators savage... I did not see that coming.
Judy and Nick's buddy-cop dynamic is the best part of the movie. Their chemistry is perfect.
The moment Nick stands up for Judy against Chief Bogo and becomes a cop himself is so triumphant.
The world-building in Zootopia is incredible. All the different districts for different animals are so creative.
The reveal that the 'savage' predators were just being drugged by a flower is a great mystery resolution.
This movie has such a great and timely message about prejudice and stereotypes.
The final scene, with Judy and Nick as partners, pulling over a speeding car, is a perfect ending.
Flash the sloth is a legendary character. He stole the whole movie.
The press conference scene, where Judy accidentally makes things worse, is so well-written and real.
The music by Shakira ('Try Everything') is such a bop.
Nick's backstory about the muzzle and why he became a cynical hustler is heartbreaking.
